attributes.action: change the immigration law allowing american citizens an easier way to visit and reside in the u.k.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
American citizens should be able to enter and reside in the u.k. without restrictions. 
They should be allowed to form relationships and marry an english resident if they choose to, as long as the person they are to marry can provide financial responsibility for there spouse.
American citizens should have the same basic human rights as eu citizens and be welcomed into the uk.
